HereĂÂ´s a little tutorial for the noobs among us:

1. Unzip file
2. Go to setup folder and install "RCATSetupx64"
3. Copy CRD file to the installation folder and run (not sure whether that is neccessary)
4. Copy keygen to installation folder and run
5. Click on patch and select "aliccl.dll" and click open
6. Copy the registration code
7. Run the program (armcp)
8. Click on bottom right of the window to enter the reg key
9. All restrictions have now been removed

Tested and working on Windows 7 x64 
100 % clean software.
